Document.name: ReadAllLinesByBom
Document.summary: Get the content of a text file by lines.
Document.returns: Returns true if this operation succeeded.
Document.param: The content of the file by lines.
Document.remarks: Lines could be separated by either CRLF or LF. A text file is not required to ends with CRLF. If the last character of the file is LF, the last line is the line before LF.
